name: SAM Dump to AppData
description: Detects suspicious SAM dump activity as cause by QuarksPwDump and other password dumpers
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-Kernel\-General AND event.code:16 AND \\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\SAM\- AND .dmp)`
